bias.Ik woon graag in mijn gemeente: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [I enjoy living in my municipality]
bias.Ik woon graag in mijn wijk: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [I enjoy living in my neighborhood]
bias.Ik ben iemand die zich klimaatbewust ged: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [I am climate-conscious]
bias.Ik denk dat de gemeente alles over warmt: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [I believe the municipality has already decided everything about the heat transition, and my opinion does not matter]
bias.De prijzen voor warmte moeten zo veel mo: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [Heat prices should be as equal as possible for everyone in the municipality]
bias.Bewoners zijn zelf in staat om te bepale: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [Residents are capable of deciding for themselves how to phase out natural gas]
bias.De gemeente is het beste in staat om te: desc_On a scale from 1 to 5, to what extent do you agree with the following statements? [The municipality is best able to determine the most affordable way to phase out natural gas]
